location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to to Captain G Walker, Senior Marine Officer in the Gulf

mods.abstract: Stannus informs Walker that he had arranged to have some marine stores, which had arrived on the Berwick,transported to Bassadore by means of a hired bugla [buggalow], as there was not room for them on the Amherst.
